name: Airtable - Better Kanban Titles
description: Makes the font slightly smaller for the Kanban card titles, and allows them to be up to two lines (instead of just one truncated line.)

user.name: Nathan Broadbent
user.about: Web and mobile developer. Founder of FormAPI (https://formapi.io)

additional_info:
This customization is not perfect, but it seems to work well enough. 

The Kanban cards are draggable, so Airtable is using position: absolute, and manually calculating the height of each card. This made it very difficult to override the CSS. However, I was able to expand the card height so that it used some of the margin between the cards. The cards are much closer together now, but I think it's worth it for the multi-line titles.

Unfortunately I can't add any more lines to the title without having access to the JavaScript source code.
